p: COVID-19 is an ongoing pandemic disease, and since the progress of infection by the SARS-CoV-2 virus can lead to severe permanent respiratory problems and possible death, there is an urgent need to provide various diagnostic strategies for early detection of the disease. SARS-CoV-2 is a novel coronavirus, therefore, it is not yet possible to determine with certainty what method is the best for reliable and accurate diagnosis of the disease.
